statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM cryptocurrency_trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_currency, trade_type FROM cryptocurrency_trades;
SELECT trade_date, trade_amount, trade_currency, trade_type FROM cryptocurrency_trades;
SELECT trade_currency, trade_amount, trade_id, trade_date FROM cryptocurrency_trades;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY' AND trade_amount > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_currency, SUM(trade_amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_trades GROUP BY trade_currency;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount, trade_type FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_type = 'SELL' ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, trade_currency, trade_amount FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_currency FROM cryptocurrency_trades WHERE trade_currency IN ('BTC', 'ETH', 'LTC') ORDER BY trade_currency ASC, trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT trader_id, cryptocurrency, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE trader_id = 1001;
SELECT trader_name, balance FROM traders ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT trader_name, country FROM traders WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name, country, balance FROM traders WHERE country IN ('USA', 'UK') ORDER BY trader_name ASC;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name, balance FROM traders WHERE balance >= 5000 AND country = 'Canada' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY cryptocurrency ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT trader_name, balance, transaction_date FROM traders JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions ON traders.trader_id = cryptocurrency_transactions.trader_id WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT user_id, currency_pair, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT transaction_id, currency_pair, amount, transaction_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE currency_pair = 'BTC-USD';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, currencies.currency_name FROM users JOIN currencies ON users.user_id = currencies.currency_id WHERE users.registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE currency_name = 'Ethereum' AND symbol = 'ETH';
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE currency='USD'
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM currencies
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, currency, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT currency_name, symbol, market_cap FROM currencies ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT trade_id, buyer_id, seller_id, currency_id, amount, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT trade_amount, trade_date FROM transaction_data WHERE cryptocurrency_type = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT trader_name, country, email_address FROM trader_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, market_price FROM cryptocurrency_data ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, country, commission_fee FROM exchange_data WHERE commission_fee < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trader_name, country, email_address FROM trader_data WHERE country = 'USA' AND trader_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, market_price, volume_traded FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE market_price > 1000 ORDER BY volume_traded DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, country, commission_fee FROM exchange_data WHERE commission_fee <= 2.50 ORDER BY exchange_name;

SELECT th.trade_date, th.trade_amount, td.cryptocurrency_type FROM transaction_history th JOIN transaction_data td ON th.transaction_id = td.transaction_id WHERE th.exchange_id = 1 ORDER BY th.trade_date ASC LIMIT 5;
